io.micronaut.http.server.codec

Class TextStreamCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.http.server.codec.TextStreamCodec
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MediaTypeCodec

    @Singleton
 @Internal
public class TextStreamCodec
extends java.lang.Object
implements MediaTypeCodec
    A MediaTypeCodec that will encode Event objects in order to support Server Sent Events.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
